author: CBS News
title: Two McDonald's in Hawaii linked to dozen virus cases
description: Officials say workers and family members were infected but it appears no customers were.
content: Honolulu — Hawaii officials said Tuesday a cluster of 12 COVID-19 cases had been linked to two McDonald's locations in Kailua Kona, a town on the Big Island. The state Health Department said seven workers and five of their family members had tested positive f… [+1971 chars]
